title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI)
description: This course covers the fundamentals of AI, its applications, and the ethical considerations surrounding its use. It is designed for beginners and includes practical examples to illustrate AI concepts.

title: AI Foundations for Everyone
description: This beginner-level course provides a comprehensive overview of AI, its impact on various industries, and how it is transforming the workplace. It also includes modules on IBM's AI tools and services.

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: This course introduces the basics of AI, its applications, and the foundational concepts that drive AI technologies. It is suitable for anyone looking to understand AI without prior technical knowledge.

title: AI for Business Leaders
description: Designed for business leaders, this course covers how AI can be leveraged in business settings, the strategic implications of AI adoption, and real-world case studies.
